lead_paragraph: To the Editor: "Some Officials Begin Exploring How to Keep People From Building in Flood Zones," reads a Jan. 15 front-page subheading. Well, it's about time. We have been wrestling with this issue since the days when much of the New World was ruled by Spain. Yet we still haven't come to terms with the problem.

headline.main: Let Those Who Live in Flood Zones Bear Cost; A Very Old Problem
